item.title: Key inflation rate shows biggest rise in 6 months, CPI shows, but Fed rate cut still appears in play
item.description: A key measure of consumer prices in July posted the biggest increase in six months, suggesting inflation is showing some upward pressure from tariffs ...

item.title: Investors bid up for Bullish’s IPO as the CoinDesk parent gets set to go public
item.description: Bullish is set to go public in the coming days, and is expected to be valued at up to $5 billion.

item.title: ​Trump is creating the perfect corporate tax — one they’ll pay. Here’s what it means for investors.
item.description: Trump’s Nvidia deal opens a ‘pay to play’ floodgate to do business in America. If you can’t afford it, don’t ask.

item.title: Trump’s latest attack on Powell involves ‘major lawsuit’ over Fed building. Why it’s unlikely to succeed.
item.description: Trump’s threat may hit a wall because of the Federal Reserve’s independence.

item.title: Why Apple may be caught in the latest crossfire between Musk and OpenAI’s Altman
item.description: Musk announced plans to sue Apple over unfairly favoring ChatGPT over Grok on the App Store.
